title: Develop an Android APP for GPS tracking and communal alarm with social environment.
desc: We are a company provider of Electronic Security solutions and we want to develop an APP intended to work as a communal alarm and a social network to connect neighborhoods to share information referral to their communities.In addition, it needs to connect to an API to provide GPS services and to connect to a platform to send signals to initiate a siren in case of an emergency or assault.Finally, this work MUST BE developed ONLINE with our IT Department in order to have a full record of this project and to prepare our team for future support to our platform. (We could work with Teamviewer or AnyDesk)We want two quotation:1) A proposal for an Android Developing only.2) A proposal for a cross-platform (Android and iOS) Developing using Xamarin.We have already a wireframe of what we want to create, the UX defined and for the UI we have another company. What we are looking its exclusively the front and back-end of the APP, the API connection, creations of the respective DB using MySQL and also a web version for managing.

title: Android App for Job Search
desc: In App:- User register with Mobile Number.- User need to enter Adhaar # and PAN number.. mendatory (No two person can use same).. if some other account using PAN/Adhaar... he will get the name of that person and our phone number in popup to claim.- relogin by entering PAN number and OTP on registered phone #- Complete profile management alongwith photo (In this section, skills is important because person will be able to view only skill based job, not all jobs he will see... So he/she do not need any job search function by skills.. for example a teached who mentioned that he is good in computer, math and sports... so he will get job related to these skills only... i will provide you the list)- Option to share profie on FB- View all available Jobs based on skills ONLY- Search available job bya. nearest location (within 5 km, within 10 km, entire city, entire state, specific city/state)b. Find job by their friends phone #- JobOnBench... this feature will come later...just one button with a popup comment- Option to apply for job with a pop up where he will confirm that he is allowing us to share his profile to employer- Push notification for new job posts related skills- Push notification from Admin for updates, profile related comments_____________In web:- Admin/Employer will longin from web- Admin will approve registered employer- No general email such as gmail,yahoo...etc allowed in employer- Employer profile management and option to post jobs- Admin will get option to approve job posts- Employer will get applications from candidates directly with phone number, photo and other details; on their email ID- One employer can post only 2 job in a day and it will be approved by admin- A one page dashboard for employer like indeed... to post job, view applications... rest details will go in their email- Admin will be able to see all the candidates who created their profile in App and option to modify, delete, accept, reject, notify candidate in message/push notification- integration on home page of the website
